string.name: material_timepicker_second
string.description: The label for a text field to select the second on the minute [CHAR_LIMIT=24]

string.name: material_second_suffix

string.name: material_second_selection
string.description: Description for button to switch to select the second [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
